name: Holiday Card 2018
description:
Happy Holidays from Esteban!!  I hope you get to celebrate the season and have a happy new year <3

This interactive card was made for Free Wi-Fi, a podcast about making games. You can hear more about that here.

~I hope there are no bugs, because I am about to hop on a flight and can't touch this again till 2019~

Featuring BGM from freemusicpublicdomain:
"O Little Town of Bethlehem - Jon Sayles"
(freemusicpublicdomain.com)
